title: Grow Your Dream: A Guide to a Productive Vegetable Garden

tasks.task: Create a vegetable garden at home
subtasks: Consider climate, garden size, and preferences
Follow planting depth and spacing requirements
Care for plants by watering regularly
Avoid over-watering to prevent root rot
Deal with pests and diseases organically
Weed regularly to prevent nutrient competition
Provide support (stakes, cages, trellises) when needed
Harvest vegetables carefully with clean tools
Harvest vegetables at optimal time (e.g., young zucchini, ripe tomatoes)

tasks.task: Have a productive and delicious vegetable garden
subtasks: Patience, care, and love for nature
